text: (Ej musrikon), agar piruzii guruhi haqro metalaʙed, inak piruzi ʙa suroƣi sumo omadaast (ja'ne, Muhammadro ʙar sumo nusrat dodem) va agar az kufr ʙozisted, ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast va agar ʙozgarded ʙa cangi ziddi Muhammad, ʙozmegardem ʙoz Muhammadro ʙar sumo nusrat medihem, on guna ki dar Badr sikast hurded va guruhi sumo harcand ʙisjor ʙosad, ʙarojaton sude naxohad dost, ki Alloh ʙo mu'minon ast ʙo kumak va nusrati xud
